goal: Design high-performance technical architecture for twofold.tech Enterprise R&D Lab website

analysis.summary: Create comprehensive technical specification documenting Astro 5.0 architecture with Neo-Brutalist design system, optimized for Lighthouse 100/100 scores and Sitecore/.NET SEO dominance
inputs: User requirements for Lighthouse dominance, island hydration, SEO supremacy
Stack: Astro 5.0+, Tailwind 4.0, Motion, View Transitions API, MDX
Deployment target: Vercel Edge with ISR
constraints: Documentation only - no STUDIO/Conduit product code implementation
Website showcases products but does not embed them
Must achieve 100/100 Lighthouse scores by design
Zero client-side JS by default (island architecture)

risks.description: Tailwind 4.0 API may have breaking changes from 3.x
risks.mitigation: Document with latest stable API, note version requirements

assumptions: Astro 5.0+ with Content Layer API is stable
Vercel Edge deployment with ISR is target platform
STUDIO and Conduit product pages are informational, not functional

steps.name: Create Technical Specification Document
steps.action: Write comprehensive TECHNICAL-SPECIFICATION.md covering architecture overview, component strategy, performance targets, and technology decisions
steps.rationale: Core deliverable that defines the entire system architecture
success_criteria: Performance targets documented with implementation approach

steps.name: Create Directory Structure Document
steps.action: Write DIRECTORY-STRUCTURE.md defining Astro-optimized project organization with Content Layer, components, and layouts
steps.rationale: Establishes file organization patterns for the implementation phase
success_criteria: Structure supports Astro 5.0 Content Layer API
Clear separation of islands vs static components

steps.name: Create Tailwind Configuration
steps.action: Write tailwind.config.ts encoding Twofold brand DNA: Neo-Brutalist design tokens, #FF5F1F orange, 5px borders, shadow system
steps.rationale: Codifies brand identity into reusable design tokens

steps.name: Create SEO Strategy Document
steps.action: Write SEO-STRATEGY.md defining keyword strategy, structured data approach, and content optimization for Sitecore/.NET topics
steps.rationale: Establishes search dominance strategy for target market
inputs: Target audience: Sitecore/.NET developers and enterprises
success_criteria: Content cluster strategy for thought leadership

checkpoints.name: Core Architecture Defined
verification: Technical spec covers all required sections
